summary:
The 10/11th Era petersen type \'X\' viking sword.
First installment in the \"Historical Weapons\" line of mods...
descriptionHtml:
[size=\"5\"][center][i]Game: Skyrim
Mod Name: Petersen Type \"X\"
Author(s): xXKevinSaerXx
Contact Info: Private Message
Version: 3.5[/i][/center][/size]

[center][URL=http://imgur.com/0f5GP][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0f5GPl.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/center]

[b]Description:[/b]
Viking Sword is a balanced, and great, weapon for players between level 7 and 15. It will appear on Draugr, and in some chests.
It\'s design is based on the 10/11th era \"Petersen Type \'X\'\" Viking sword...
The weapon is one-handed, featuring:
[list]

[*]2048x2048 Textures
[*]Scabbard
[*]Blood Splatter
[*]HQ Normal Maps
[*]Realistic Blade Textures
[/list]
Viking Sword is also craftable and upgradeable through a forge and gindstone. The weapon is not buyable.

[b]Stats:[/b]
Base Damage:
12 ----> Grindstone ----> 16

Value:
300 ----> Grindstone ----> 700

Weight:
10 ----> Grindstone ----> 12

[b]Changelog: [/b]
23.05.2012 - Released Version 3.6, Added new normal map. General Quality Increased.
22.05.2012 - Released Version 3.5. Added new textures and modified meshes.

[b]Required Files: 
[/b]None

[b]Installation: 
[/b]Just use NMM

[b]Uninstallation: 
[/b]Deactive and uninstall with NMM

[b]Known Issues: 
[/b]None

[b]Incompatibilities: 
[/b]None

[b]Tools Used: 
[/b][list]
[*]Nevercenter Silo (Modeling)
[*]Photoshop
[*]Nifskope
[*]Marmoset Toolbag
[/list]

[b]Permissions: 
[/b]You may use this however you want, aslong as you give me credit and informs me of where my mod is used.

][b]Credits:
[/b]Werne - Original Sword Mesh

[i]Thanks To:
Thanks to the nexus community for support and feedback!
Thanks to Werne for the original sword model!
Thanks to theMOTOSXORPIO for help with the creation kit, and for general support!
Thanks to Millenia for guiding me through the texturing process and for support![/i][/color]
author: xXKevinSaerXx
